name: Shockwave Surfer
description:
Shockwave Surfer Platformer with Shockwaves

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game description: 

Play as the shockwave surfer as you parkour across a landscape of procedurally generated platforms!

Featuring: 

Shockwave ability, which will launch you into the air but scramble your controls, Dynamic environment that changes as you progress, Geometric destruction, fully animated shockwaves and more!

Team:

Coach: Tom Kun

Programmer:  Colin, Alex, Tom

Game Designer: Alex, Max

Artist: Molly, Eesta

Sound: Colin

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49
Theme: Unstable
